channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Translate WordPress with GTranslate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Translate WordPress with GTranslate

item.title: CVE-2021-25103|2024-08-03T19:56:10.614Z -- unknown -- translate%20wordpress%20with%20gtranslate
item.description: The Translate WordPress with GTranslate WordPress plugin before 2.9.7 does not sanitise and escape the body parameter in the url_addon/gtranslate-email.php file before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue. Note: exploitation of the issue requires knowledge of the NONCE_SALT and NONCE_KEY
